company.name: Comfortside West LLC
company.tagline: Your Trusted Source for Wholesale Ductless Air Conditioning Systems
company.description: At Comfortside West LLC, we proudly offer top-tier mini split systems from leading brands like Cooper&Hunter, Olmo, and Bravo. Each brand delivers exceptional efficiency, reliability, and advanced features, ensuring you find the perfect solution to meet your home's unique climate control needs.

valuePropositions.title: High Quality
valuePropositions.description: Top-tier mini split systems from leading brands

valuePropositions.title: Cost-Effective
valuePropositions.description: Wholesale prices without compromising on quality

brands.name: Cooper&Hunter
brands.description: Cooper&Hunter is a distinguished leader in the HVAC industry, renowned for its innovative and high-performance mini split systems. With over 20 years of experience, the brand has established a reputation for delivering reliable, energy-efficient solutions designed to enhance comfort and convenience.

brands.name: Olmo
brands.description: Olmo is a dynamic brand in the HVAC market, recognized for delivering high-quality mini split systems that balance advanced technology with affordability. Their systems are designed for energy efficiency, quiet operation, and sleek aesthetics, providing reliable comfort while keeping your budget in mind.

brands.name: Bravo
brands.description: Bravo is a standout brand in the mini split market, known for its exceptional affordability and reliable performance. Offering budget-friendly climate control solutions, Bravo combines cost-effectiveness with quality, making it an ideal choice for homeowners seeking efficient heating and cooling without a high price tag.

dealerProgram.name: Cooper&Hunter Pro-Tech Dealer Program
dealerProgram.description: Designed to reward HVAC contractors for their loyalty through multiple incentive tiers

financial: Points earned toward merchandise or cash with each transaction
Extended warranty coverage up to 3 years on registered systems
support: Access to training videos, tutorials, and Cooper&Hunter University courses
Exclusive events for Gold members (travel costs covered, includes C&H HQ visits)

hero.headline: Upgrade your home's comfort with our energy-efficient mini split units, offering precise climate control and quiet operation for any room.
hero.description: Discover the perfect solution for year-round comfort with our state-of-the-art mini split AC units. These versatile systems provide efficient cooling and heating with precise temperature control, ensuring every corner of your home stays comfortable.
